name: Metamagic Demo
description:
Click the full-screen button in the bottom right-hand corner to see the full game window.

A top-down strategic magic manipulation shooter. The player can manipulate spell projectiles by swapping around modular spell components.

Controls

WASD: Move the character

Mouse pointer: Aim

Spacebar: Toggle Spirit Sight

Left-click: Shoot spell;  During Spirit Sight open the instance rune inventory for a projectile

Right-click: Quick swap runes between the player and instance rune windows.

Tab: Close rune set windows

(Debug) T: Open rune tomb
